headline: Is Pfizer A Recovery Opportunity After Covid Vaccine Boom Fades?
summary: If you are wondering whether Pfizer at around $25 a share is a value trap or a genuine opportunity, this breakdown will help you decide whether it deserves a spot on your watchlist right now. Despite a tough few years, the stock has inched up about 2.5% over the last year, even though it is still down roughly 5.3% year to date and more than 40% over three years, a mix that often signals shifting expectations around risk and recovery potential. Recent attention has focused on how Pfizer is...
